Hoboken.Pommes Frites:
Pommes Frites is a New York City restaurant which specializes in Belgian-style french fries. The restaurant was located in the East Village at 123 2nd Avenue (near 7th Street), but relocated to 123 Macdougal Street after the original building was destroyed by a natural gas explosion.
The restaurant sells only one food item: french fries, served in paper cones, with a variety of sauces to choose from.
